question: friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.In your lettergive contact details for when you are awaygive instructions about how to care for your petdescribe other household dutiesWrite at least 150 words. You do NOT nee
text: Hey buddy, I hope you are doing great. I'm writing this letter in connection with my pet which you will be taking care of when I'm on my holidays.

First of all, I will give you my satellite number to contact me when you cannot reach me on  a normal call. The number is 705456777. In addition, you could also reach me through my hubby's email which is [email protected]

Fetty which is my cat's name needs to be fed twice a day and you will be able to find her treat in the kitchen near the gas stove. You can also take her out for a walk in the evening for 10 mins if she becomes cranky. in addition, don't try to give her a bath as it will get her mad.
Furthermore, it could be of  great help if you could do the lawn if you had spare time. And, please water my plants evening morning or else they would die.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
